item.title: 【Helpdesk】Site sections don't stay minimized
item.description:
I like my browsing to be streamlined, and I'm glad for the section-minimizing feature. However it doesn't stick.

Especially that uber-lame PicMania section with all the elderly virgins creaming themselves over cringe softcore celebrity pics, and the one at the bottom. They keep getting unminimized.

Sharemania needs to start trimming out useless sections, and should stick to being an Audio/Video sharing platform. Nobody cares about Celeb Goss & Movie/TV discussion, that's what reddit is for, and that's why those subforums here are dead.
item.author: KingOfHell1661
